sentences.en: Atop Athena's helmet, between winged griffins, crouched an inscrutable sphinx.
sentences.cn: 在雅典娜头盔的上方 、 于带翼的狮身鹰首兽之间, 蹲伏着一头神秘难测的狮身人史芬克斯.

sentences.en: Daisy , on this occasion , continued to present herself as an inscrutable combination of audacity and innocence.
sentences.cn: 戴西这时的表现却是一如既往, 既有些大胆放肆,又有些天真无邪,依旧叫人难以捉摸.

sentences.en: Even if the connections were visible, they would remain inscrutable to most people.
sentences.cn: 即便这些联系是可见的, 但它们对大多数人来说还是无法理解的.

sentences.en: Even so, the motive may prove inscrutable.
sentences.cn: 即便如此, 其动机可能还是令人费解.

sentences.en: He always left behind him an inscrutable prescription.
sentences.cn: 他总是留下一张深奥的药方.
他静静地站着，让人难以捉摸。

sentences.en: His inscrutable face does not show what he is thinking.
sentences.cn: 他那神秘莫测的面孔看不出在想什么.

sentences.en: Inscrutable are the ways of Heaven.
Man, poor creature,. is nothing more than the sport of the inscrutable wind of fortune.
sentences.cn: 人就是可怜地被不可知的“风”支配着!

sentences.en: Of course , to naive girls like myself , you're inscrutable.
sentences.cn: 当然我们不知世事的女孩子, 莫测高深.

sentences.en: She gave him , straight in the eyes, a look which was also inscrutable.
sentences.cn: 她还目光炯炯地注视了他一下, 这也使他不能理解.

sentences.en: She regarded her with a look of inscrutable alarm and terror.
sentences.cn: 她带着不可思议的惊讶和恐惧打量着她.
她是不可动摇的, 不可理解的, 不可捉摸的.

sentences.en: The older men, as a rule, were inscrutable.
sentences.cn: 年纪大些的人照例是不可捉摸的.

sentences.en: The riddle remains inscrutable to us.
sentences.cn: 那个谜对我们仍然是不可解的.

sentences.en: When Hanson came home he wore the same inscrutable demeanour.
sentences.cn: 汉生回到家里,脸上仍是一副莫测高深的表情.

words.tran_cn: 神秘的；不可理解的；不能预测的；不可思议的

trans.tran_cn: 不可理解的，谜一样的，神妙莫测
trans.tran_en: someone who is inscrutable shows no emotion or reaction in the expression on their face so that it is impossible to know what they are feeling or thinking
